lead_paragraph: World kick-boxing champion Gary Daniels (The Expendables) stars with Peter Weller (RoboCop I&II, TV’s Dexter) in the adrenaline-fuelled mixed martial arts action-thriller FORCED TO FIGHT. Once a legend in the brutal world of illicit underground fi
